jobDescription: Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications. Reviewing application requirements and interface designs. Coordinate with Remote team/clients. Identifying web-based user interactions. Developing and implementing highly-responsive user interface components using PHP concepts.Research and recommend new technologies and tools for effective integration across various platforms.Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
jobResponsibility:
1.Writing clean, efficient, and well-documented code in a variety of programming languages and frameworks. 
 2.Developing and maintaining websites and web applications. 
 3.Collaborating with designers, other developers, and project managers to ensure that projects are completed on time and meet the desired specifications. 
 4.Troubleshooting and debugging code to fix issues and improve website performance. 
 5.Testing websites and web applications to ensure that they are fully functional and meet user requirements. 
 6.Staying up-to-date with new web development technologies, tools, and trends. 
 7.Optimizing websites and web applications for search engines (SEO) and accessibility. 
 8.Developing and maintaining databases, APIs, and other backend systems. 
 9.Creating and maintaining technical documentation for projects. 
 10.Providing technical support to clients and end-users as needed.
educationalRequirements:
1. A strong understanding of web development languages, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, as well as web development frameworks, such as React, Angular, and Vue. 
 2. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Ruby, or Java. 
 3. Experience with web development tools such as Git, GitHub, and code editors like Visual Studio Code or Sublime Text. 
 4. Familiarity with front-end development frameworks and libraries like Bootstrap, Material UI, and jQuery. 
 5. Knowledge of web development concepts such as responsive design, cross-browser compatibility, and accessibility. 
 6. Experience with database systems like MySQL, MongoDB, and SQL Server. 
 7. Familiarity with APIs and web services. 
 8. Understanding of website security best practices. 
 9. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. 
 10. Strong communication and teamwork skills to collaborate with other developers, designers, and project managers. 
 11. A degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field is preferred, but not always required. Relevant work experience, coding bootcamps, and self-taught skills may also be considered.
experiences: Minimum 5-7 years experience in Mern-Stack development

jobDescription: We are looking for a talented Video Editor to assemble recorded footage into a finished project that matches director’s vision and is suitable for broadcasting.Ultimately, as a Film and Video Editor, you should be able to bring sight and sound together in order to tell a cohesive story
jobResponsibility: editing a variety of events, scripted video productions, and creative video projects across a dynamic range of event types and industries.
educationalRequirements: Video editing is the manipulation and arrangement of video shots. Video editing is used to structure and present all video information, including films and television shows, video advertisements and video essays.
experiences: Minimum 2-3 years experience in Video Editing

jobDescription: If you live and breathe digital marketing, we want to talk to you. We are looking for a Digital Marketing Manager to develop, implement, track and optimize our digital marketing campaigns across all digital channels.
jobResponsibility:
Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns. 
 Design, build and maintain our social media presence. 
 Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs) 
 Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights. 
 Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests 
 Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points 
 Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience. 
 Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate
educationalRequirements:
BS/MS degree in marketing or a related field 
 Proven working experience in digital marketing 
 Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and/or display advertising campaigns 
 Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate 
 Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels 
 Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments. 
 Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends) 
 Working knowledge of ad serving tools (e.g., DART, Atlas) 
 Experience in setting up and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns 
 Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints 
 Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement
experiences: Minimum 3-4 years experience in Professional Digital Marketer

jobDescription: We are looking for a dynamic UI/UX designer who will be responsible for the user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design of our various digital assets. You will ensure that all elements of the online user experience are optimized for improved usability, usefulness, and exceptional visual design.
jobResponsibility:
1.nvestigating user experience design requirements for our suite of digital assets. 
 2.Developing and conceptualizing a comprehensive UI/UX design strategy for the brand. 
 3.Producing high-quality UX design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes. 
 4.Designing UI elements and tools such as navigation menus, search boxes, tabs, and widgets for our digital assets. 
 5.Testing UI elements such as CTAs, banners, page layouts, page designs, page flows, and target links for landing pages. 
 6.Collaborating with the marketing team, and internal and external designers to ensure the creation and delivery of tailored experiences for the digital user. 
 7. Providing advice and guidance on the implementation of UX research methodologies and testing activities in order to analyze and predict user behavior. 
 8. Adhering to style standards on typography and graphic design.
educationalRequirements:
1. A bachelor's degree and a minimum of 2 years UI/UX design experience for digital products or services. 
 2. A portfolio of professional UI/UX design work for both web and mobile platforms. 
 3. Working knowledge of the following technologies and software: Sketch, InVision, Visio, HTML, CSS (SCSS), iOS, Android, Design Systems, and Adobe Creative Suite. 
 4. A team player but can work independently too. 
 5. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. 
 6. Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
experiences: Minimum 4-5 years experience in UI/UX Deigning

jobDescription: We are looking for a music editor to be responsible for editing and mixing music for audio-visual material. The responsibilities of a music editor include synchronizing music to scenes, creating sound effects, and creating the mood desired by the Director.To be successful as a music editor, you should demonstrate good communication and teamwork skills, be highly creative, and be able to concentrate for long periods of time. Ultimately, a top-notch music editor should have the ability to take direction, create a balanced end product, and solve complex problems.
jobResponsibility:
1.Synchronizing music to video content.. 
 2.Creating and compiling soundtracks. 
 3.Creating original music. 
 4.Keeping up-to-date with the latest music from different genres. 
 5.Collaborating with music professionals. 
 6.Editing sound effects and music according to the director's vision.
educationalRequirements:
1. Qualification in film scoring, music production, sound engineering, or related field. 
 2. Technical skill in mixing, scoring, and editing. 
 3. A portfolio of previous work. 
 4. A creative approach to music editing. 
 5. A good ear for musical tones. 
 6. The ability to balance audio and visuals effectively. 
 7. The ability to take constructive criticism.
experiences: Minimum 6-7 years experience in Music Editing & work Professionally

jobDescription: As a 3D Artist, you should have complete knowledge of various 3D modeling software. In addition to this, you should have a strong professional background. You should be highly creative and have the ability to work collaboratively. Your ability to manage deadlines and offer excellent customer service will be an added advantage.
jobResponsibility:
Creating visual elements, effects, and animations using 3D modeling, texturing, and other techniques. 
 Analyzing 3D arts and graphics and suggesting improvements. 
 Developing 3D graphics inline with the industry standards
educationalRequirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Designing, Computer Graphics, Fine Arts, or equivalent. 
 3+ years of work experience as a Graphic Designer, Visual Effects Artist, or a similar position in the Design industry. 
 Complete knowledge of various 3D design techniques like Digital Sculpting, Procedural Modeling, Edge modeling, and Box/Subdivision Modeling. 
 Familiarity with 3D modeling software such as Blender, Sketchup, and AutoCAD. 
 Having a strong portfolio of previous artworks and projects. 
 Good time management and organizational skills. 
 Strong communication skills 
 A team player and having the ability to work independently
experiences: Minimum 4-5 years experience in 3D Modeling & Graphic Design
